article_title: Section of Blondo Street will close for widening
article_text:
Thank you for reading and relying on Omaha.com for your news and information. You have now viewed your 30 day allowance of 12 free Omaha.com articles. og.description: Monday, city traffic engineers said, Blondo Street will shut at 9 a.m. from El Dorado Drive to 153rd Street until November 2015. The closing is for the scheduled widening and reconstruction of Blondo by Tab Construction.
og.title: Section of Blondo Street will close for widening

article_metadata.description: Monday, city traffic engineers said, Blondo Street will shut at 9 a.m. from El Dorado Drive to 153rd Street until November 2015. The closing is for the scheduled widening and reconstruction of Blondo by Tab Construction.
